title: Extract duplicated apiRequest function from Google backends
description: Extract the duplicated apiRequest function from google-tasks-backend.ts and google-calendar-backend.ts into a shared utility in google-auth.ts

phases.name: Create shared utility function
phases.description: Add the apiRequest function to google-auth.ts as an exported utility

subtasks.title: Add apiRequest function to google-auth.ts
subtasks.description:
Create a generic apiRequest<T> function that handles authenticated Google API requests. The function should:
- Accept url (full URL string), options (RequestInit)
- Call ensureValidToken() to get access token
- Make fetch request with Bearer authorization header
- Handle 401 errors with descriptive message
- Handle other HTTP errors with status info
- Return parsed JSON response typed as T
acceptance_criteria: Function signature: apiRequest<T>(url: string, options?: RequestInit): Promise<T>
Sets Authorization: Bearer and Content-Type headers
Throws descriptive error on other HTTP errors

phases.name: Update backends to use shared function
phases.description: Replace the private apiRequest methods in both backend classes with calls to the shared function

subtasks.title: Update google-tasks-backend.ts to use shared apiRequest
subtasks.description: Replace the private apiRequest method with a wrapper that calls the shared function. The wrapper constructs the full URL from baseUrl + endpoint and delegates to googleAuth.apiRequest.
acceptance_criteria: Private apiRequest method is simplified to construct URL and call googleAuth.apiRequest
All existing API calls continue to work

subtasks.title: Update google-calendar-backend.ts to use shared apiRequest
subtasks.description: Replace the private apiRequest method with a wrapper that calls the shared function. The wrapper constructs the full URL from baseUrl + endpoint and delegates to googleAuth.apiRequest.
acceptance_criteria: Private apiRequest method is simplified to construct URL and call googleAuth.apiRequest
All existing API calls continue to work
subtasks.notes: Replaced private apiRequest method in google-calendar-backend.ts with a wrapper that constructs full URL from baseUrl + endpoint and delegates to googleAuth.apiRequest<T>(). Reduced method from 27 lines to 13 lines (52% reduction). All acceptance criteria met: Private apiRequest method simplified, no changes to public API.
